description: Formats customer service responses for specific communication channels (email, chat, etc). Returns the formatted text, channel type, tone assessment, review flag, and character count.

result.summary: Provided a sample response for the chat channel.

data.formatted_response: Hi there! How can I assist you today? If you need help with your account or have any questions, just let me know—I'm here to help!
